forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers this morning. Peeks of sunshine later. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow developing during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will mix with and change to rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will mix with and change to rain overnight. Low 29F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
